      public static void projectEditor(Statement statement, int num) throws SQLException
      Method to change the details of a Project, specifying the number of the project to be changed.
      This method changes the details of a specified Project and replaces the new details in the database.

      num - The number of the Project Object which needs to be edited

      SQLException

    • createInvoice

      public static void createInvoice(String name, double balance, String customer)
      Method to create a Tax Invoice in the form of text file, specifying the name of the invoice, the balance due and the customer.
      This method creates a text file with an invoice number, which includes the customer's details and amount payable
      Parameters:
      name - The invoice number
      balance - The amount payable
      customer - The customer's details
      See Also:
      • finaliseProject()

    • search

      public static void search(Statement statement) throws SQLException
      Method to find a specified Project.
      This method allows the user to enter either a project number, or name and see a list of all the projects with that number or name
